text: Andreas Westh (born 22 May 1977) is a Swedish bandy sweeper who currently plays for Elitserien side Bollnäs GIF. ==Career== ===Club career=== Westh is a youth product of Bollnäs and has represented their senior team and Sandviken.http://www.bandysidan.nu/player.php?SpelareID=171 ===International career=== Westh was part of Swedish World Champions teams of 2005, 2009, 2010, 2012, and 2017.http://www.svenskbandy.se/LANDSLAG/HERRLANDSLAGET/Historikochstatistik/Sverigesvarldsmastartrupper/ ==Honours== ===Country=== ; Sweden: * Bandy World Championship:http://www.svenskbandy.se/LANDSLAG/HERRLANDSLAGET/Historikochstatistik/Sverigesvarldsmastartrupper/ 2005, 2009, 2010, 2012, 2017 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish bandy players Category:Bollnäs GIF players Category:Sandvikens AIK players Category:Sweden international bandy players Category:Bandy World Championship-winning players
title: Andreas Westh
